title: Concert v1.0.2 Schema for Deploy SBOMs

bomFormat.title: BOM Format
bomFormat.description: Format of the BOM. This value MUST be "ConcertDef".

serialNumber.title: BOM Serial Number
serialNumber.description: The unique URN of the BOM file. Prefix of the URN (e.g., 'urn:ibm:<clientName>:<appName>') must be registered with Concert.

version.title: BOM Version
version.description: Version of the BOM file. The default version is '1'.

metadata.title: BOM Metadata
metadata.description: Provides additional information about a BOM.

components.title: Components
components.description: A list of top-level software components.

runtime-components.title: Runtime Components
runtime-components.description: A list of deployment runtime components.

services.title: Components
services.description: A list of services in Application SBOM or in deploy SBOM.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: Provides the ability to document dependency relationships.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An optional list of strings that can be used for searching or filtering

refType.description: An identifier which can be used to reference the component elsewhere in the BOM. Every bom-ref MUST be unique within the BOM.

refLinkType.description:
Descriptor for an element identified by the attribute 'bom-ref' in the same BOM document.
In contrast to `bomLinkElementType`.

bomLinkDocumentType.title: CycloneDX BOM-Link Document
bomLinkDocumentType.description: Descriptor for another BOM document. See https://cyclonedx.org/capabilities/bomlink/
bomLinkDocumentType.$comment: part of the pattern is based on `bom.serialNumber`'s pattern

bomLinkElementType.title: CycloneDX BOM-Link Element
bomLinkElementType.description: Descriptor for an element in a BOM document. See https://cyclonedx.org/capabilities/bomlink/
bomLinkElementType.$comment: part of the pattern is based on `bom.serialNumber`'s pattern

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 date and time when the BOM was created.

type.title: Metadata Type
type.description:
Specifies the ConcertDef type of the software component.  The types are:

* __application__ = A software application definition without environment-dependent deployment specifics for its constituent containers, code repositories, services, and/or API endpoints.
* __build__ = A component comprising versioned container image artifact and the associated versioned code repository.
* __deploy__ = A component comprsing deployment components, runtime-components, and relevant services and API endpoint URLs for deploying environment-specific application microservices.

environment.title: Deployment Environment
environment.description: Deployment environment of the ConcertDef Deploy component.  It must be one of the deployment environments of any ConcertDef Application component that includes this Deploy component.

component.title: Metadata Component
component.description: ConcertDef component labels used for searching or selecting in Concert.

version.title: Version
version.description: Versioon string of the ConcertDef component.

deploy-number.title: Deployment Number
deploy-number.description: Deployment string of the ConcertDef Deploy component.  This property is required if the component type is `deploy`.

change-request-url.title: Change Request URL
change-request-url.description: Change request string of the ConcertDef Deploy component.

object-container.title: Container Object
object-container.description: Container object with build inventory data.  Container image URI needs be available via the "uri" property or by composing the values of other properties, e.g., <"name", "tag", "digest"> or <"purl", "digest">.

uri.title: Container Image URI
uri.description: Structured URI containing image registry path, image tag, and image digest.  It is recommended to use that as a UID for the container image.

purl.title: Container Image PURL
purl.description: Container image registry path and tag

tag.title: Image Tag
tag.description: Image tag.  It can be a timestamp if a source code

name.title: Code Name
name.description: Name of the source/deployment Code object.

purl.title: Code Repo URL
purl.description: URL of the source or deployment repo.

commit_sha.title: Commit Sha
commit_sha.description: Commit sha of a git repo.

name.title: Kubernetes Runtime Name
name.description: Name of the Kubernetes runtime. This is often a shortened, single name of the component.  It is recommended to use container-platform-dependent cluster id.

api-server.title: Kubernetes API Server
api-server.description: URL of the Kubernetes API server.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Valid property names for kubernetes runtime are: "platform", "cluster_platform", "cluster_id", "cluster_region", "cluster_name".

components.title: Namespace Components of a Kubernetes Runtime Environment

type.title: Namespace
type.description: A namespace or project in the Kubernetes cluster.

components.title: Container Objects
components.description: A list of Container objects deployed to the namespace.  Info on container image URI is needed, which can be specified via the `"uri" property or a composition of related properties.

runtime-component-vm.title: Runtime Component - VM
runtime-component-vm.description: A VM or server based deployment runtime.

type.title: Runtime Component Type - VM
type.description: A VM or server deployment runtime.

name.title: VM Name
name.description: VM name. This is often a shortened, single name of the component.  It is recommended to use the value of "hostname".

hostname.title: Server Hostname
hostname.description: Domain Name or IP address of the host.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Valid property names for VM/server runtime are: "vm_id".

components.title: Container and Library Objects
components.description: A array of Container and Library objects deployed to the VM.

runtime-component-zos.title: Runtime Component - VM
runtime-component-zos.description: A VM or server based deployment runtime.

name.title: zOS Name
name.description: zOS name, often a LPAR name.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Valid property names for zOS runtime are: "subsystem".

components.title: Container and Library Objects
components.description: A array of Container and Library objects deployed to the VM.

name.title: Service Name
name.description: Name of the service. This is often a shortened, single name of the service.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: An important property a service in the deployment environment is "base_url".  A full API service endpoint is formed by composing the base URL with the API access path specified in the associated Application SBOM.

dependency.title: Dependency
dependency.description: Defines the direct dependencies of a component or service.

ref.title: Reference
ref.description: References a component or service by its bom-ref attribute

dependsOn.title: Depends On
dependsOn.description: The bom-ref identifiers of the components or services that are dependencies of this dependency object.

property.title: Lightweight name-value pair
property.description: Provides the ability to document properties in a name-value store. This provides flexibility to include data not officially supported in the standard without having to use additional namespaces or create extensions. Unlike key-value stores, properties support duplicate names, each potentially having different values.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the property. Duplicate names are allowed, each potentially having a different value.
